C

Chat - Class in application
Represents a single message within a chat room, containing information about the sender's role, username, the message content, and the chat room in which it is posted.
Chat(int, int, String, String, String) - Constructor for class application.Chat
Constructs a new Chat message with an explicit ID, typically used when loading a message from the database.
Chat(int, String, String, String) - Constructor for class application.Chat
Constructs a new Chat message without an explicit ID, to be used when creating a new message in the database.
ChatRoom - Class in application
Represents a private chat room between exactly two users, identified by their user IDs.
ChatRoom(int, int) - Constructor for class application.ChatRoom
Constructs a ChatRoom object without an explicit ID, used for creating a new room.
ChatRoom(int, int, int) - Constructor for class application.ChatRoom
Constructs a ChatRoom object with an existing ID, typically loaded from the database.
ChatRoomApp - Class in application
A JavaFX application that manages the UI for a single chat room, allowing the current user to view and send chat messages.
ChatRoomApp() - Constructor for class application.ChatRoomApp
Default constructor for ChatRoomApp (primarily for testing via Application.launch()).
ChatRoomApp(int, DatabaseHelper, User) - Constructor for class application.ChatRoomApp
Constructs a ChatRoomApp that references a specific chat room ID, as well as the database helper and the currently logged-in user.
chatRoomId - Variable in class application.ChatRoomApp
 
chatRoomList - Variable in class application.ChatRoomList
 
ChatRoomList - Class in application
Maintains a list of ChatRoom objects, providing functionality to load them from the database and search them by user ID.
ChatRoomList() - Constructor for class application.ChatRoomList
Constructs a new, empty ChatRoomList.
ChatRoomListApp - Class in application
A JavaFX application that displays all ChatRooms available to the currently logged-in user.
ChatRoomListApp() - Constructor for class application.ChatRoomListApp
Default no-argument constructor for JavaFX Application compatibility.
ChatRoomListApp(DatabaseHelper, User) - Constructor for class application.ChatRoomListApp
Constructs a ChatRoomListApp with the given DatabaseHelper and User.
chatRoomsManager - Variable in class application.ChatRoomListApp
 
ChatTests - Class in application
A collection of JUnit tests for the Chat class, verifying creation and retrieval of chat messages under various conditions (minimum, average, maximum content length, etc.).
ChatTests() - Constructor for class application.ChatTests
 
checkForValidUserName(String) - Static method in class application.UserNameRecognizer
This method is a mechanical transformation of a Finite State Machine diagram into a Java method.
clear() - Static method in class application.UserSession
